description:
MixMarvel is the No.1 global game publishing platform powered by blockchain

MIXMARVEL is a multiplayer online game community powered by blockchain and a large-scale virtual 3D world created by global players and developers. MM brings good content, players, and developers together, allowing developers to release content they created and gain long-term returns. At the same time, players will be able to find better content in the community, obtain digital assets, and manage those assets.
name: MixMarvel
